Climate Control: Integrate a small air conditioning and heating unit into the bed frame to maintain a comfortable temperature without disturbing the rest of the room.

Smart Sleep Tracking: Install a small sleep tracker under the mattress that can monitor sleep patterns, including duration, quality, and stages of sleep. This information can be synced with a smartphone app to provide personalized sleep recommendations.

Massage Function: Incorporate a built-in massage system that uses vibration and pressure sensors to provide a customizable massage experience.
Aromatherapy: Add a small diffuser with a variety of pre-programmed scents to promote relaxation and improve sleep quality.
